name: Bisk Club Sugar Free Cracker Biscuit
Zero Cal Box 75 Sachets 1 box
description:
Zerocal gives a rich taste to sweet beverages and desserts that does not become bitter afterwards, and its main ingredient, sucralose has no known side effects on health as tested in the last 20 years by over 100 scientific bodies and now has approval from apex regulatory bodies. name: Fresh Whole Wheat Flour (Atta)
description:
Current Promotional Period: 10-Feb-2025 To 28-Feb-2025*Based on Stock**It might not be valid for all Cities Manufacturer: Meghna group of industriesFresh Whole wheat atta is produced from selected Canadian golden wheat. To make it pure, this wheat is refined by the combo cleaning method. It is powdered by applying Europe's BUHLER technology. So, all the nutritional parts of the wheat such as bran, sprouts, etc. are kept intact. Fresh whole wheat atta contains:More vitamins, thus increasing immunity.More ProteinMore fibre which is good for digestion.Controls the weight of your body. Nutritional values: Protein, calcium, iron, magnesium, dietary fibers, vitamin A vitamin E, zinc.

Manufacturer: Meghna group of industries
Fresh Whole wheat atta is produced from selected Canadian golden wheat. To make it pure, this wheat is refined by the combo cleaning method. It is powdered by applying Europe's BUHLER technology. So, all the nutritional parts of the wheat such as bran, sprouts, etc. are kept intact. Fresh whole wheat atta contains:
More vitamins, thus increasing immunity.
More Protein
More fibre which is good for digestion.
Controls the weight of your body. 
Nutritional values: Protein, calcium, iron, magnesium, dietary fibers, vitamin A vitamin E, zinc.

description:

name: Kellogg's Oats Cereal
description:

Organic: No  •  You can make different tasty & quick dishes with Kellogg’s oats, so you can make a smart start to a healthy lifestyle in a yummy way.

name: Sugar Free Gold 300 Pellets
description:
Sugar Free Gold, available in a convenient 300-pellet pack with a total weight of 30 grams, is your trusted companion on your journey to a sugar-free and low-calorie lifestyle. It is a premium artificial sweetener that offers the sweetness you love without the calories and health concerns associated with regular sugar. Trust in Sugar Free Gold to provide you with the sweetness you desire without the calories you want to avoid.

name: Ensure Diabetes Care Drink Powder Vanilla Flavour
description:
Ensure Diabetes Care Drink Powder in Vanilla Flavor is a specially formulated nutritional supplement designed to meet the unique dietary needs of individuals managing diabetes. This 400-gram canister contains a carefully balanced blend of nutrients, including carbohydrates, proteins, and dietary fiber, to support blood sugar management while providing essential nutrition. Ensure Diabetes Care offers a tasty and practical solution to support your dietary needs while promoting overall health and well-being. Trust in the expertise of Ensure to provide you with a reliable and diabetes-friendly nutritional option.

name: Stute Diabetic Strawberry Extra Jam
description:
Stute Diabetic Strawberry Extra Jam is a delightful and health-conscious choice for those seeking a delicious fruit spread with reduced sugar content. Crafted with care, this strawberry jam is specially formulated to provide the classic taste of sweet and tangy strawberries while being suitable for individuals with diabetes or those looking to reduce their sugar intake. Packaged in a 430 gm jar, Stute Diabetic Strawberry Extra Jam is a guilt-free and flavorful addition to your breakfast table or as a versatile ingredient in various recipes.

name: Bashundhara Brown Flour (Lal Atta)
description:
Bashundhara Brown Flour, also known as Lal Atta, is a type of whole wheat flour that is commonly used in South Asian cuisine. It is made from grinding whole wheat grains, including the bran, germ, and endosperm, which gives it a brown color and a slightly coarser texture compared to refined wheat flour.

name: Quaker Oats Jar
description:
The Quaker Oats Jar 900 gm is a classic and versatile breakfast staple that has been cherished for generations. Made from whole grain oats, this oatmeal is known for its heart-healthy qualities, nutty flavor, and satisfying texture. It comes in a convenient 900 gm jar, making it easy to enjoy a nutritious and delicious breakfast at home. Start your day with the nourishment and satisfaction of Quaker Oats and savor the goodness of whole grains.

name: Marks Milk Based Diabetic Diet Tin
description:
Introducing Marks Milk Based Diabetic Diet Tin, a thoughtfully crafted nutritional solution designed to cater to the dietary needs of individuals managing diabetes. Presented in a convenient 400 gm tin, this product offers a balanced and specially formulated milk-based option to support a diabetic-friendly lifestyle. Marks Milk Based Diabetic Diet Tin is a nutritional innovation created to provide a wholesome and nourishing choice for those who need to monitor their blood sugar levels. This product is formulated with a focus on balanced carbohydrates and nutrients, making it suitable for individuals seeking to maintain stable glucose levels while enjoying a satisfying dairy-based option.

name: Virginia White Oats
description:
Virginia White Oats 400 gm are a nutritious and versatile whole-grain cereal known for their mild, nutty flavor and numerous health benefits. These oats are a staple in many kitchens, loved for their ability to be used in a wide range of dishes, from hearty breakfasts to baked goods and more. Enjoy the natural goodness and versatility of whole oats while reaping their numerous health benefits.

name: Quaker White Oats
description:
Quaker White Oats 500g is a nutritious and wholesome breakfast option made from pure, whole grain oats. Known for its smooth texture and mild flavor, it can be used in a variety of recipes, from traditional oatmeal to baking and smoothies. Quaker White Oats are rich in fiber, essential vitamins, and minerals, making them an excellent choice for a healthy diet. Ingredients:Whole Grain Oats Benefits:Rich in Fiber: Supports digestive health and helps maintain a feeling of fullness.Heart-Healthy: Contains soluble fiber, which may help reduce cholesterol levels and promote cardiovascular health.Nutrient-Dense: Packed with essential vitamins, minerals, and antioxidants, including iron and B-vitamins.Low Glycemic Index: Helps regulate blood sugar levels, making it a great option for those looking to maintain energy levels throughout the day.
